artist: Artist: Auguste Louis Lepère; Editor: A. Desmoulins
description: bridge with pedestrians; buildings in background, with tall tower in ULQ
provenance: [Judith L. Pillsbury, Paris, until 1998; set of 20 plates with frontispiece sold in May for AOOO to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1998-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LLC, in black ink: [A Lepère]; LRC in the plate, in black: [A. LEPERE PINX]
title: Le Point Saint-Michel, plate 12 from "Le Long de la Seine et des Boulevards"
